General.Name: Twin Ridge Capital Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Twin Ridge Capital Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends to identify, acquire, and build a company in the consumer or distribution sector. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Naples, Florida.
General.Address: 999 Vanderbilt Beach Road, Naples, FL, United States, 34108
